hero.headline: LLEDO Industries
hero.subheadline: Engineering, precision machining and industrial maintenance for aerospace and defense since 1989. A collective of experts bringing together MPEB, EGI, FREM and MGP to manage your projects end-to-end.

features.title: Why Choose LLEDO Industries?
features.subtitle: Recognized technical expertise and quality commitment to meet your industrial needs.

list.title: Regulatory Compliance
list.description: All our equipment complies with EN 12312, EN 1915 standards and the Machinery Directive 2006/42/EC.

list.title: Precision Machining
list.description: 3 to 5-axis precision machining and mechanical part fitting according to client specifications.

list.title: On-Time Delivery
list.description: Meeting agreed deadlines through optimized organization and production capacity.

list.title: Expert Team
list.description: Specialists in elementary part manufacturing, tooling and special machinery.

list.title: Continuous Innovation
list.description: Ongoing R&D to develop cutting-edge technical solutions and improve our products.

list.title: Support
list.description: Technical support and client team training to ensure equipment mastery.

process.title: Integrated Quality Process
process.subtitle: From design to commissioning, we master the entire value chain to ensure quality and compliance of our solutions.

footer.address: 9-11 Boulevard de la Capelane, 13170 Les Pennes-Mirabeau
